books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 29th book in the Prey series. Lucas Davenport goes after a serial killer.
books.name: NEON PREY

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The fifth book in the Memory Man series. The first man Amos Decker put behind bars asks to have his name cleared.
books.name: REDEMPTION

books.author: by E L James
books.description: Maxim Trevelyan inherits several estates and beds his cleaner Alessia Demachi, an Albanian piano prodigy who has been trafficked into England.
books.name: THE MISTER

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: The 29th book in the Argeneau series. Santo Notte falls for a history professor in upstate New York.
books.name: THE TROUBLE WITH VAMPIRES

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Martha Hall Kelly
books.description: In 1914, the New York socialite Eliza Ferriday works to help White Russian families escape from the revolution.
books.name: LOST ROSES

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering. Basis of the HBO series.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Greg Weisman
books.description: The first book in the Magic: The Gathering: War of the Spark series. Nicol Bolas, the Elder Dragon, attacks the city of Ravnica.
books.name: WAR OF THE SPARK: RAVNICA

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: A Russian count undergoes 30 years of house arrest in the Metropol hotel, across from the Kremlin.
books.name: A GENTLEMAN IN MOSCOW

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A dark secret emerges when Allie Garvey returns home to attend a childhood friend’s funeral.
books.name: SOMEONE KNOWS

books.author: by Richard Powers
books.description: Winner of the 2019 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. Nine people drawn to trees for different reasons fight for the last of the remaining acres of virgin forest.
books.name: THE OVERSTORY

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE
